topic_metadata.title: How can I set the language of the TOC heading in a template?

posts.name: Vinzenz Geisler
posts.cooked:
Hello,
I want to use this template: modern-technique-report – Typst Universe.
How can I get the header of the Contents Table in German (“Inhaltsverzeichnis”)?
posts.raw:
Hello,
I want to use this template: https://typst.app/universe/package/modern-technique-report.
How can I get the header of the Contents Table in German ("Inhaltsverzeichnis")?

posts.cooked:
Hey @Vinzenz_Geisler,

you have to set the language of the document text with #set text(lang: "de"). This works because Typst provides translations for standard elements like the outline heading.
posts.raw:
Hey @Vinzenz_Geisler,

you have to set the language of the document text with `#set text(lang: "de")`. This works because Typst provides translations for standard elements like the outline heading.
